panels.description: Ports that are flapping or aren't responding to pings (from CPingmesh).

targets.expr:
min by (host, nic) (increase(pingmesh_server_pings_total{host=~"$system"}[5m]) == 0)
unless on (host, nic)
(pingmesh_server_healthy < 1)

panels.title: Network Health

list.description: Glitch counts above this threshold will be considered errors.
list.label: Glitch Threshold
list.name: glitch_thresh

list.description: Current values above this threshold will be considered errors.
list.label: Current Threshold (A)
list.name: current_thresh

list.description: Voltage values above this threshold will be considered errors.
list.label: Voltage Threshold (V)
list.name: voltage_thresh
